channel.title: How to make a RPS
channel.description: how do i make my own runescape private server? i cant get Java JDK installed. everytime i try to compile the server it says that i dont have it. But i did dl it

item.title: How to make a RPS
item.dc:creator: @Raw-pkage Raw-pkage
item.description:
@Raw-pkage wrote:

dam thats a good compiler

[[quote author=facundo link=topic=346475.msg2668971#msg2668971 date=1234734180]
Do this: Right click on your compiler > Edit.

On the file opened, delete everything and paste this:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Then save, and run the compiler. Hope this helped you:)

Facundo.
[/quote

Read full topic

The perfect compiler FTW.
